text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

translation.en: [Theirs is] like the custom of the people of Pharaoh and those before them. They denied Our signs, so Allah seized them for their sins. And Allah is severe in penalty
translation.id: (Keadaan mereka) seperti keadaan pengikut Fir'aun dan orang-orang yang sebelum mereka. Mereka mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami, maka Allah menyiksa mereka disebabkan dosa-dosanya. Allah sangat berat hukuman-Nya
